DOC.brief_summary: A prospective, comparative, randomized single surgeon study comparing minimally invasive total hip arthroplasty (MIS) via anterior approach to conventional total hip arthroplasty via anterolateral transgluteal approach.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Two Surgical Approaches for Total Hip Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with osteoarthritis of the hip and have decided to undergo total hip arthroplasty Patients willing to sign the consent form Patient is unwilling to sign the consent form Patient is involved in another study
DOC.keyword: Evaluate early functional outcomes of two anterior approaches to total hip arthroplasty
